title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When previewing the series, no friendly error message is displayed when there is no data available.
EB: When there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the series preview. 2. Ensure that there is no data available for the series. 3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
